lines.dialogue: I'm going to open my eyes now, did you... Oh. That's disappointing. I'm going to be honest though I had my eyes open the whole time, I was looking right at you. That wasn't the problem though was it? Too much pressure, hang on, I'll give you a little extra time, maybe that will help grease the wheels. Just, ya know, do something, anything?
lines.instruction: Press enter to continue your vow of silence...
